title: In Venezuela’s Election, Maduro’s Ruling Party Faces an Existential Vote
content: Sunday’s election could mark the end of a generation of rule by Venezuela’s socialist party. It could also usher in a period of profound uncertainty.
summary: Sunday’s election could mark the end of a generation of rule by Venezuela’s socialist party. It could also usher in a period of profound uncertainty.

title: As F-16s Arrive, Ukraine Still Faces Steep Challenges in the Skies
